RECRUIT_ONE.title: Recruit Your First Builder
RECRUIT_ONE.description: Bring one person into the consciousness revolution who will actually build
RECRUIT_ONE.success_criteria: One new builder signs up and completes their first contribution

FIRST_CONTRIBUTION.title: Make Your First Contribution
FIRST_CONTRIBUTION.description: Submit a bug report, feature idea, or help another builder
FIRST_CONTRIBUTION.success_criteria: One actionable contribution submitted and acknowledged

NFT_TO_CONSCIOUSNESS.title: Bridge NFTs to Consciousness Revolution
NFT_TO_CONSCIOUSNESS.description: Connect your NFT knowledge to help build consciousness-based digital assets
NFT_TO_CONSCIOUSNESS.success_criteria: Design or propose one consciousness NFT system

DOMAIN_EXPLORER.title: Explore All Seven Domains
DOMAIN_EXPLORER.description: Visit and understand all seven consciousness domains
DOMAIN_EXPLORER.success_criteria: Complete orientation quiz for all 7 domains

BUILD_SOMETHING.title: Actually Build Something
BUILD_SOMETHING.description: Stop exploring, start creating - ship one real feature or tool
BUILD_SOMETHING.success_criteria: One completed feature merged to main or deployed live
